SELECT mainsite_info, mainsite_min_capacity, mainsite_max_capacity, mainsite_no, mainsite_parking_size, mainsite_min_price, mainsite_add_price, mainsite_name, mainsite_img1, mainsite_img2, mainsite_img3, mainsite_section, mainsite_size, mainsite_type, mainsite_reg_date, mainsite_reservation_start, mainsite_reservation_end, camp_no FROM MAINSITE WHERE camp_no = #{campNo} AND temp_no = 0 AND (#{startDate} < mainsite_reservation_start or #{startDate} >= mainsite_reservation_end) AND (#{endDate} <= mainsite_reservation_start or #{endDate} > mainsite_reservation_end) AND delete_flag = 'N' OR (camp_no =#{campNo} AND delete_flag = 'N' AND mainsite_reservation_end is NULL)
ORDER BY mainsite_type
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CAMP_RESERVATION (user_id, camp_no, mainsite_no, reservation_status, reservation_reg_date, reservation_user_name, reservation_start_date, reservation_end_date, use_num, reservation_user_phone, reservation_reg_car_num, reservation_request, total_payment_price, total_reservation_reg_car) VALUES (#{user.id}, #{camp.campNo}, #{mainSite.mainSiteNo}, #{reservationStatus}, NOW(), #{reservationUserName}, #{reservationStartDate}, #{reservationEndDate}, #{useNum}, #{reservationUserPhone}, #{reservationRegCarNum:VARCHAR}, #{reservationRequest:VARCHAR}, #{totalPaymentPrice}, #{totalReservationRegCar:NUMERIC});
mapper.update:
UPDATE CAMP_RESERVATION set
mainsite_no = #{mainSite.mainSiteNo},
reservation_user_name = #{reservationUserName:VARCHAR},
reservation_start_date = #{reservationStartDate},
reservation_end_date = #{reservationEndDate},
use_num = #{useNum},
reservation_user_phone = #{reservationUserPhone:VARCHAR},
reservation_reg_car_num = #{reservationRegCarNum:VARCHAR},
reservation_request = #{reservationRequest:VARCHAR},
total_payment_price = total_payment_price+#{totalPaymentPrice},
total_reservation_reg_car = #{totalReservationRegCar},
reservation_status = #{reservationStatus}
WHERE reservation_no = #{reservationNo}
WHERE reservation_end_date = DATE(NOW()) AND reservation_status IN (1, 2, 3)
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT r.reservation_no, u.camp_name, m.mainsite_type, r.reservation_status, r.reservation_reg_date, r.reservation_start_date, r.reservation_end_date, r.total_payment_price, r.camp_no, r.reservation_user_name, r.reservation_user_phone, r.use_num, u.camp_call FROM CAMP_RESERVATION r, MAINSITE m, CAMP c, USERS u WHERE c.user_id = u.user_id AND c.camp_no = r.camp_no AND r.mainsite_no = m.mainsite_no AND r.user_id = #{id}

SELECT DISTINCT r.reservation_no, u.camp_name, m.mainsite_type, r.reservation_status, r.reservation_reg_date, r.reservation_start_date, r.reservation_end_date, r.total_payment_price, r.camp_no, r.reservation_user_name, r.reservation_user_phone, r.use_num, u.camp_call, u.addr FROM CAMP_RESERVATION r, MAINSITE m, CAMP c, USERS u WHERE c.user_id = u.user_id AND c.camp_no = r.camp_no AND r.mainsite_no = m.mainsite_no AND r.delete_flag = 'N'
AND r.user_id = #{id}
AND r.camp_no = #{campNo}
AND r.reservation_status IN (1, 2)
AND u.camp_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.searchKeyword},'%')
AND m.mainsite_type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.searchKeyword},'%')
AND r.reservation_reg_date LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.searchKeyword},'%')
r.reservation_reg_date DESC
r.total_payment_price DESC
r.total_payment_price ASC
r.reservation_status ASC
r.reservation_status DESC
r.reservation_reg_date DESC
r.reservation_reg_date ASC
LIMIT #{search.pageSize} OFFSET #{search.offset}

SELECT r.reservation_no, r.camp_no, r.mainsite_no, r.reservation_status, r.reservation_reg_date, r.reservation_user_name, r.reservation_start_date, r.reservation_end_date, r.use_num, r.reservation_user_phone, r.reservation_reg_car_num, r.reservation_request, r.total_payment_price, r.total_reservation_reg_car, r.delete_flag, r.payment_type, u.camp_name, u.camp_call, m.mainsite_type, c.camp_img1 FROM CAMP_RESERVATION r, USERS u, MAINSITE m, CAMP c WHERE r.camp_no = c.camp_no AND c.user_id = u.user_id AND r.mainsite_no = m.mainsite_no AND r.reservation_no = #{value};
SELECT reservation_status FROM CAMP_RESERVATION WHERE user_id = #{value} AND reservation_status IN (1, 2, 3, 4)

SELECT AC.ACOUNT, DC.DCOUNT, WC.WCOUNT, MC.MCOUNT, YC.YCOUNT, BYDC.BYDCOUNT, BYWC.BYWCOUNT, BYMC.BYMCOUNT, BYYC.BYYCOUNT FROM (SELECT COUNT(reservation_reg_date) ACOUNT FROM CAMP_RESERVATION ) AC, (SELECT COUNT(reservation_reg_date) DCOUNT FROM CAMP_RESERVATION WHERE reservation_reg_date BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -1 DAY ) AND NOW() ) DC, (SELECT COUNT(reservation_reg_date) WCOUNT FROM CAMP_RESERVATION WHERE reservation_reg_date BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -1 WEEK ) AND NOW() ) WC, (SELECT COUNT(reservation_reg_date) MCOUNT FROM CAMP_RESERVATION WHERE reservation_reg_date BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -1 MONTH ) AND NOW() ) MC, (SELECT COUNT(reservation_reg_date) YCOUNT FROM CAMP_RESERVATION WHERE reservation_reg_date BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -1 YEAR ) AND NOW() ) YC, (SELECT COUNT(reservation_reg_date) BYDCOUNT FROM CAMP_RESERVATION WHERE reservation_reg_date BETWEEN DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 YEAR),INTERVAL -1 DAY) AND DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 year) ) BYDC, (SELECT COUNT(reservation_reg_date) BYWCOUNT FROM CAMP_RESERVATION WHERE reservation_reg_date BETWEEN DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 YEAR),INTERVAL -1 WEEK) AND DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 year) ) BYWC, (SELECT COUNT(reservation_reg_date) BYMCOUNT FROM CAMP_RESERVATION WHERE reservation_reg_date BETWEEN DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 YEAR),INTERVAL -1 MONTH) AND DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 year) ) BYMC, (SELECT COUNT(reservation_reg_date) BYYCOUNT FROM CAMP_RESERVATION WHERE reservation_reg_date BETWEEN DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 YEAR),INTERVAL -1 YEAR) AND DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 year) ) BYYC;

SELECT u.user_id CID, u.camp_name CNAME, r.reservation_reg_date DATE, COUNT(r.reservation_reg_date) DCOUNT FROM CAMP_RESERVATION r, USERS u, CAMP c WHERE r.camp_no = c.camp_no AND c.user_id = u.user_id
AND u.camp_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
GROUP BY r.reservation_reg_date, u.user_id
r.reservation_reg_date DESC
DCOUNT DESC
DCOUNT ASC
LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(r.reservation_reg_date, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(r.reservation_reg_date)-1) DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') as START, DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(r.reservation_reg_date, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(r.reservation_reg_date)-7) DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') as END, u.user_id CID , u.camp_name CNAME, COUNT(r.reservation_no) WCOUNT FROM CAMP_RESERVATION r, USERS u, CAMP c WHERE r.camp_no = c.camp_no and c.user_id = u.user_id
AND u.camp_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
GROUP BY r.reservation_reg_date, u.user_id
r.reservation_reg_date DESC
WCOUNT DESC
WCOUNT ASC
LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT MONTH(r.reservation_reg_date) AS DATE, u.user_id CID, u.camp_name CNAME, COUNT(r.reservation_reg_date) MCOUNT FROM CAMP_RESERVATION r, USERS u, CAMP c WHERE r.camp_no = c.camp_no and c.user_id = u.user_id
AND u.camp_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
GROUP BY DATE, u.user_id
r.reservation_reg_date DESC
MCOUNT DESC
MCOUNT ASC
LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT u.user_id CID, u.camp_name CNAME, r.reservation_reg_date DATE, COUNT(r.reservation_reg_date) DCOUNT FROM CAMP_RESERVATION r, USERS u, CAMP c WHERE r.camp_no = c.camp_no AND c.user_id = u.user_id
AND u.camp_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
GROUP BY r.reservation_reg_date, u.user_id) countTable

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(r.reservation_reg_date, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(r.reservation_reg_date)-1) DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') as START, DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(r.reservation_reg_date, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(r.reservation_reg_date)-7) DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') as END, u.user_id CID , u.camp_name CNAME, COUNT(r.reservation_no) WCOUNT FROM CAMP_RESERVATION r, USERS u, CAMP c WHERE r.camp_no = c.camp_no and c.user_id = u.user_id
AND u.camp_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
GROUP BY r.reservation_reg_date, u.user_id) countTable

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT MONTH(r.reservation_reg_date) AS DATE, u.user_id CID, u.camp_name CNAME, COUNT(r.reservation_reg_date) MCOUNT FROM CAMP_RESERVATION r, USERS u, CAMP c WHERE r.camp_no = c.camp_no and c.user_id = u.user_id
AND u.camp_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
GROUP BY DATE, u.user_id) countTable

SELECT u.camp_name, m.mainsite_type, r.reservation_user_name, r.reservation_user_phone, r.reservation_start_date, r.reservation_end_date, r.reservation_reg_date FROM CAMP c , CAMP_RESERVATION r, USERS u, MAINSITE m WHERE c.camp_no = r.camp_no and c.user_id = u.user_id and r.mainsite_no = m.mainsite_no and r.reservation_start_date-1 = DATE(NOW())
